creator: Tim.Whittington@orionhealth.com
text:
http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=41535 highlighted some
deficiencies in the debug logging around reading from request streams.
This patch adds logging for when data is read from a request in IIS.

creator: Tim.Whittington@orionhealth.com
text:
Created attachment 19541
Debug logging for ReadClient.patch

Comited, thanks,
BTW, your patch was a total mess regarding formating :)
creator: mturk@apache.org

text: Move a couple of fixed JK issues from resolved to closed.
